00097         enum State {
00098                 CLOSE   = 0,
00099                 TIMEOUT = 1,
00100                 BROKEN  = 2,
00101                 CONNECT = 3,
00102                 LOGIN   = 4
00103         };
00104 
00105         USocket(bool bSocketIsIPv6 = false)
00106                 {
00107                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, USocket, "%b", bSocketIsIPv6)
00108 
00109                 iState      = CLOSE;
00110                 iSockDesc   = -1;
00111                 bLocalSet   = false;
00112 #ifdef HAVE_IPV6
00113                 bIPv6Socket = bSocketIsIPv6;
00114 #else
00115                 bIPv6Socket = false;
00116 #endif
00117 
00118                 if (str_range == 0) str_allocate();
00119                 }
00120 
00121         virtual ~USocket()
00122                 {
00123                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, USocket)
00124 
00125                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("iSockDesc = %d", iSockDesc)
00126 
00127                 if (isOpen()) USocket::closesocket();
00128                 }
00129 
00130         int& state()             { return iState; }
00131 
00132         bool isOpen() const      { return (iSockDesc != -1); }
00133         bool isClosed() const    { return (iSockDesc == -1); }
00134         bool isConnected() const { return (iState >= CONNECT); }
00135         bool isLogin() const     { return (iState == LOGIN); }
00136         bool isTimeout() const   { return (iState == TIMEOUT); }
00137         bool isBroken() const    { return (iState == BROKEN); }
00138         bool isSysError() const  { return (iState  < CLOSE); }
00139 
00144         void checkErrno(int value)
00145                 {
00146                 U_TRACE(0, "USocket::checkErrno(%d)", value)
00147 
00148                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(value < 0)
00149 
00150                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("errno = %d", errno)
00151 
00152                 iState = (errno == EAGAIN ? TIMEOUT : (closesocket(), BROKEN));
00153 
00154                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("state = %d", iState)
00155                 }
00156 
00161         bool checkIO(int iBytesTransferred, int iMaxBytesTransfer);

00169         static int socket(int domain, int type, int protocol)
00170                 {
00171                 U_TRACE(1, "USocket::socket(%d,%d,%d)", domain, type, protocol)
00172 
00173                 int fd = U_SYSCALL(socket, "%d,%d,%d", domain, type, protocol);
00174 
00175                 U_RETURN(fd);
00176                 }
00177 
00178         bool socket(int iSocketType, int protocol = 0)
00179                 {
00180                 U_TRACE(1, "USocket::socket(%d,%d)", iSocketType, protocol)
00181 
00182                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(isClosed())
00183 
00184                 iSockDesc = socket(bIPv6Socket ? AF_INET6 : AF_INET, iSocketType, protocol);
00185 
00186                 U_RETURN(isOpen());
00187                 }
00188 
00189         int getFd() const { return iSockDesc; }
00190 
00191         void close()
00192                 {
00193                 U_TRACE(0, "USocket::close()")
00194 
00195                 closesocket();
00196 
00197                 iState = CLOSE;
00198                 }

00204         bool getSockOpt(int iCodeLevel, int iOptionName, void* pOptionData, uint32_t& iDataLength)
00205                 {
00206                 U_TRACE(1, "USocket::getSockOpt(%d,%d,%p,%p)", iCodeLevel, iOptionName, pOptionData, iDataLength)
00207 
00208                 U_CHECK_MEMORY
00209 
00210                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(isOpen())
00211 
00212                 bool result = (U_SYSCALL(getsockopt, "%d,%d,%d,%p,%p", iSockDesc, iCodeLevel, iOptionName, CAST(pOptionData), (socklen_t*)&iDataLength) == 0);
00213 
00214                 U_RETURN(result);
00215                 }
00216 
00221         bool setSockOpt(int iCodeLevel, int iOptionName, const void* pOptionData, uint32_t iDataLength)
00222                 {
00223                 U_TRACE(1, "USocket::setSockOpt(%d,%d,%p,%u)", iCodeLevel, iOptionName, pOptionData, iDataLength)
00224 
00225                 U_CHECK_MEMORY
00226 
00227                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(isOpen())
00228 
00229                 bool result = (U_SYSCALL(setsockopt, "%d,%d,%d,%p,%u", iSockDesc, iCodeLevel, iOptionName, CAST(pOptionData), iDataLength) == 0);
00230 
00231                 U_RETURN(result);
00232                 }

00238         bool connectServer(const UIPAddress& cAddr, int iServPort)
00239                 {
00240                 U_TRACE(1, "USocket::connectServer(%p,%d)", &cAddr, iServPort)
00241 
00242                 U_CHECK_MEMORY
00243 
00244                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(isOpen())
00245 
00246                 iRemotePort    = iServPort;
00247                 cRemoteAddress = cAddr;
00248 
00249                 if (connect()) U_RETURN(true);
00250 
00251                 U_RETURN(false);
00252                 }

00355         const char* getRemoteInfo()
00356                 {
00357                 U_TRACE(0, "USocket::getRemoteInfo()")
00358

00366         void getRemoteInfo(UString& buffer)
00367                 {
00368                 U_TRACE(0, "USocket::getRemoteInfo(%p)", &buffer)
00369 
00370                 const char* address = getRemoteInfo();
00371 
00372                 int len = u_snprintf(buffer.data(), buffer.capacity(), "%2d '%s:%u'", iSockDesc, address, iRemotePort);
00373 
00374                 buffer.size_adjust(len);
00375                 }

00381         uint32_t getBufferRCV()
00382                 {
00383                 U_TRACE(1, "USocket::getBufferRCV()")
00384 
00385                 uint32_t size, tmp = sizeof(uint32_t);
00386 
00387                 getSockOpt(SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, (void*)&size, tmp);
00388 
00389                 U_RETURN(size);
00390                 }

00520         int recvBinary16Bits()
00521                 {
00522                 U_TRACE(0, "USocket::recvBinary16Bits()")
00523 
00524                 uint16_t uiNetOrder;
00525                 int iBytesLeft = sizeof(uint16_t);
00526                 char* pcEndReadBuffer = ((char*)&uiNetOrder) + iBytesLeft;
00527 
00528                 do {
00529                         iBytesLeft -= recv((void*)(pcEndReadBuffer - iBytesLeft), iBytesLeft);
00530                         }
00531                 while (iBytesLeft);
00532 
00533                 U_RETURN((int)ntohs(uiNetOrder));
00534                 }
00535 
00543         uint32_t recvBinary32Bits()
00544                 {
00545                 U_TRACE(0, "USocket::recvBinary32Bits()")
00546 
00547                 uint32_t uiNetOrder;
00548                 int iBytesLeft = sizeof(uint32_t);
00549                 char* pcEndReadBuffer = ((char*)&uiNetOrder) + iBytesLeft;
00550 
00551                 do {
00552                         iBytesLeft -= recv((void*)(pcEndReadBuffer - iBytesLeft), iBytesLeft);
00553                         }
00554                 while (iBytesLeft);
00555 
00556                 U_RETURN(ntohl(uiNetOrder));
00557                 }
00558 
00565         bool sendBinary16Bits(int iData)
00566                 {
00567                 U_TRACE(0, "USocket::sendBinary16Bits(%d)", iData)
00568 
00569                 uint16_t uiNetOrder = htons(iData);
00570 
00571                 bool result = (send(&uiNetOrder, sizeof(uint16_t)) == sizeof(uint16_t));
00572 
00573                 U_RETURN(result);
00574                 }
00575

00586                 uint32_t uiNetOrder = htonl(lData);
00587 
00588                 bool result = (send(&uiNetOrder, sizeof(uint32_t)) == sizeof(uint32_t));
00589 
00590                 U_RETURN(result);
00591                 }

00642         virtual int recv(void* pBuffer, int iBufLength)
00643                 {
00644                 U_TRACE(0, "USocket::recv(%p,%d)", pBuffer, iBufLength)
00645 
00646                 U_CHECK_MEMORY
00647 
00648                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(isOpen())
00649 
00650                 int iBytesRead = recv(iSockDesc, CAST(pBuffer), iBufLength, 0);
00651 
00652                 U_RETURN(iBytesRead);
00653                 }
